title: Angry Birds
description: Catapult sinister-looking birds to destroy the fortresses protecting green pigs!

title: Bad Parenting
description: Play as a child trapped in a house with a mysterious nighttime visitor who rewards good children with gifts. Explore the themes of discipline, trauma, and fear in this disturbing and unsettling game with multiple endings.

title: Cuphead (POTENTIALLY OUT OF ORDER)
description: Play as Cuphead or Mugman as you traverse strange worlds, acquire new weapons, learn powerful super moves, and discover hidden secrets while you try to pay your debt back to the devil!

title: Crazy Cattle 3D
description: Crazy Cattle 3D is an independent battle royale game where you play as an explosive sheep whose goal is to be the last sheep standing.

title: Crazy Kitty 3D
description: Crazy Kitty 3D is an independent battle royale game where you play as an explosive cat whose goal is to be the last cat standing.

title: Crazy Chicken 3D
description: Crazy Chicken 3D is an independent battle royale game where you play as an explosive chicken whose goal is to be the last chicken standing.
